thread.title: Arsenal transfer news: Hector Bellerin eyed again by Barcelona | Metro News
thread.title_full: Arsenal transfer news: Hector Bellerin eyed again by Barcelona | Metro News

author: Mark Brus For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Arsenal transfer news: Hector Bellerin eyed again by Barcelona | Metro News
text:
Manchester United CEO Ed Woodward tells star he can leave IMMEDIATELY 
According to Mundo Deportivo , his old club remain keen to bring him back, and could be boosted in their efforts if Arsene Wenger does end up leaving the Emirates Stadium in the summer. 
The Frenchman’s future has been the subject of much speculation for some time now, as he is yet to put pen to paper on an extension to his current contract, which expires at the end of this campaign. 
Bellerin, however, only recently signed a new long-term deal with Arsenal, so it would likely take big money from Barcelona to persuade the Gunners to let him go. Arsenal fixtures 
Liverpool (A) – Sat 4 Mar Bayern Munich – Champions League (H) – Tue 7 Mar Lincoln – FA Cup (H) – 11/12 Mar West Brom (A) – Sat 18 Mar Manchester City (H) – Sat 1 Apr West Ham (H) – Tue 4 Apr Crystal Palace (A) – Sat 8 Apr
